articles.title: Trial Period Movie Review: Genelia's film bores you with a predictable storyline - India Today
articles.description: Trial Period is a beautiful ode to familial relationships. However, it doesn't leave much of an emotional impact. Here's our review.
articles.content: By Grace Cyril: A father on rent for 30 days! The idea sounds bizarre, but director Aleya Sen tries to make it look convincing on screen with Trial Period. However, it just isn't enough. Starring Gen… [+3732 chars]

articles.title: Kohrra breakout star Suvinder Vicky says ‘success has no age’ as he looks back at his two-decade long struggle: ‘This is what stardom feels like?’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Suvinder Vicky opens up about the love he is receiving for Kohrra and the day when the Mumbai-based crew of the Netflix show didn't realise that he was the main lead and instead addressed him as "chacha".

articles.content: A commercial court at Bengaluru on Wednesday allowed the producers of Hostel Hudugaru Bekagiddare to release the film on Friday after depositing 50 lakh.
